s1_coh6_vv.name: data
s1_coh6_vv.description: Median 6-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100). Note that due to the orbits of S-1A & S-1B the 6-days coherence is spatially limited to some areas (i.e. mainly continental Europe).

s1_coh6_hh.name: data
s1_coh6_hh.description: Median 6-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100). Note that due to the orbits of S-1A & S-1B the 6-days coherence is spatially limited to some areas (i.e. mainly continental Europe).

s1_coh12_vv.name: data
s1_coh12_vv.description: Median 12-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh12_hh.name: data
s1_coh12_hh.description: Median 12-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh18_vv.name: data
s1_coh18_vv.description: Median 18-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh18_hh.name: data
s1_coh18_hh.description: Median 18-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh24_vv.name: data
s1_coh24_vv.description: Median 24-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh24_hh.name: data
s1_coh24_hh.description: Median 24-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh36_vv.name: data
s1_coh36_vv.description: Median 36-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh36_hh.name: data
s1_coh36_hh.description: Median 36-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh48_vv.name: data
s1_coh48_vv.description: Median 48-days repeat-pass coherence at VV polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_coh48_hh.name: data
s1_coh48_hh.description: Median 48-days repeat-pass coherence at HH polarizations. Values are scaled to percent (0 -> 100).

s1_amp_vv.name: data
s1_amp_vv.description: Mean radiometrically terrain corrected backscatter (gamma0) at VV polarization. Values are scaled to int16, to revert to db apply the following function f(x) = 20*np.log10(x) - 83.

s1_amp_vh.name: data
s1_amp_vh.description: Mean radiometrically terrain corrected backscatter (gamma0) at VH polarization. Values are scaled to int16, to revert to db apply the following function f(x) = 20*np.log10(x) - 83.

s1_amp_hh.name: data
s1_amp_hh.description: Mean radiometrically terrain corrected backscatter (gamma0) at HH polarization. Values are scaled to int16, to revert to db apply the following function f(x) = 20*np.log10(x) - 83.

s1_amp_hv.name: data
s1_amp_hv.description: Mean radiometrically terrain corrected backscatter (gamma0) at HV polarization. Values are scaled to int16, to revert to db apply the following function f(x) = 20*np.log10(x) - 83.

s1_inc.name: data
s1_inc.description: Local incidence angle averaged (in unweighted manner) across relative orbits in degrees.

hand.name: data
hand.description: Height Above Nearest Drainage (HAND) is a terrain model that normalizes topography to the relative heights along the drainage network and is used to describe the relative soil gravitational potentials or the local drainage potentials. Each pixel value represents the vertical distance to the nearest drainage. The HAND data provides near-worldwide land coverage at 30 meters.

s2_band01.name: coastal
s2_band01.description: Coastal aerosol band (~443nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 1.

s2_band02.name: blue
s2_band02.description: Blue band (~494nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 2.

s2_band03.name: green
s2_band03.description: Green band (~560nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 3.

s2_band04.name: red
s2_band04.description: Red band (~665nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 4.

s2_band05.name: rededge1
s2_band05.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~704nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 5.

s2_band06.name: rededge2
s2_band06.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~740nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 6.

s2_band07.name: rededge3
s2_band07.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~781nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 7.

s2_band08.name: nir
s2_band08.description: Near infrared (NIR) band (~834nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8.

s2_band08A.name: nir08
s2_band08A.description: Narrow near infrared (NIR) band (~864nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8A.

s2_band09.name: nir09
s2_band09.description: Water vapour band (~944nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 9.

s2_band11.name: swir16
s2_band11.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~1612nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 11.

s2_band12.name: swir22
s2_band12.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~2195nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 12.

scl.name: scl
scl.description: SCL categories (as provided by Sen2Cor processor)

s1_amp_vv.name: vv
s1_amp_vv.description: Gamma naught values of signal transmitted with vertical polarization and received with vertical polarization with radiometric terrain correction applied. To convert to decibel (db) apply the following function f(x) = 10*np.log10(x).

s1_amp_vh.name: vh
s1_amp_vh.description: Gamma naught values of signal transmitted with vertical polarization and received with horizontal polarization with radiometric terrain correction applied. To convert to decibel (db) apply the following function f(x) = 10*np.log10(x).

s1_amp_hh.name: hh
s1_amp_hh.description: Gamma naught values of signal transmitted with horizontal polarization and received with horizontal polarization with radiometric terrain correction applied. To convert to decibel (db) apply the following function f(x) = 10*np.log10(x).

s1_amp_hv.name: hv
s1_amp_hv.description: Gamma naught values of signal transmitted with horizontal polarization and received with vertical polarization with radiometric terrain correction applied. To convert to decibel (db) apply the following function f(x) = 10*np.log10(x).

s2_band01.name: B01
s2_band01.description: Coastal aerosol band (~443nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 1.

s2_band02.name: B02
s2_band02.description: Blue band (~494nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 2.

s2_band03.name: B03
s2_band03.description: Green band (~560nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 3.

s2_band04.name: B04
s2_band04.description: Red band (~665nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 4.

s2_band05.name: B05
s2_band05.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~704nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 5.

s2_band06.name: B06
s2_band06.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~740nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 6.

s2_band07.name: B07
s2_band07.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~781nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 7.

s2_band08.name: B08
s2_band08.description: Near infrared (NIR) band (~834nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8.

s2_band08A.name: B8A
s2_band08A.description: Narrow near infrared (NIR) band (~864nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8A.

s2_band09.name: B09
s2_band09.description: Water vapour band (~944nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 9.

s2_band11.name: B11
s2_band11.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~1612nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 11.

s2_band12.name: B12
s2_band12.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~2195nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 12.

lndst_coastal.name: coastal
lndst_coastal.description: Coastal with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 0.44 μm μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.02 μm (OLI). Note: Only available for OLI (i.e. Landsat 8/9 from 2013 onwards). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_blue.name: blue
lndst_blue.description: Visible blue with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 0.49 μm (TM), 0.48 μm (ETM), 0.48 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.07 μm (TM), 0.07 μm (ETM), 0.06 μm (OLI). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_green.name: green
lndst_green.description: Visible green with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 0.56 μm (TM), 0.56 μm (ETM), 0.56 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.08 μm (TM), 0.08 μm (ETM), 0.06 μm (OLI). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_red.name: red
lndst_red.description: Visible red with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 0.66 μm (TM), 0.66 μm (ETM), 0.65 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.06 μm (TM), 0.06 μm (ETM), 0.04 μm (OLI). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_nir08.name: nir08
lndst_nir08.description: Near infrared with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 0.83 μm (TM), 0.84 μm (ETM), 0.87 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.14 μm (TM), 0.13 μm (ETM), 0.03 μm (OLI). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_swir16.name: swir16
lndst_swir16.description: Shortwave infrared with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 1.65 μm (TM), 1.65 μm (ETM), 1.61 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.2 μm (TM), 0.2 μm (ETM), 0.09 μm (OLI). Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_swir22.name: swir22
lndst_swir22.description: Shortwave infrared with following specs: Spatial resolution: 30 m. Center wavelength: 2.22 μm (TM), 2.2 μm (ETM), 2.2 μm (OLI). Full width half max: 0.27 μm (TM), 0.28 μm (ETM), 0.19 μm (OLI).Scale: 0.0000275. Offset -0.2.

lndst_lwir109.name: lwir11
lndst_lwir109.description: Longwave infrared / surface temperature band with following specs: Spatial resolution: 100 m. Center wavelength: 10.9 μm (OLI). Full width half: 0.59 μm (OLI). Note: Only available for OLI (i.e. Landsat 8/9 from 2013 onwards). Scale: 0.00341802. Offset 149. Unit: kelvin.

lndst_lwir114.name: lwir
lndst_lwir114.description: Longwave infrared / surface temperature band with following specs: Spatial resolution: 100 m. Center wavelength: 11.45 μm (TM), 11.34 μm (ETM). Full width half: 2.1 μm (TM), 2.05 μm (ETM). Note: Only available for TM & ETM (i.e. Landsat 4-7). Scale: 0.00341802. Offset 149. Unit: kelvin.

lndst_qa.name: qa_pixel
lndst_qa.description: Collection 2 Level-1 products 8-bit cloud quality assessment band (QA_Pixel). Spatial resolution: 30 m. Important: Different encodings are used for Landsat 4-7 and Landsat 8-9. For Landsat 4-7: Bit 0: Fill [0 = image data, 1 = fill data], Bit 1: Dilated Cloud [0 = cloud is not dilated or no cloud, 1 = cloud dilation], Bit 2: Unused [0 = no confidence level or low confidence, 1 = high confidence unused], Bit 3: Cloud [0 = cloud confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence cloud], Bit 4: Cloud Shadow [0 = cloud shadow confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence cloud shadow], Bit 5: Snow [0 = snow/ice confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence snow cover], Bit 6: Clear [0 = if cloud or dilated cloud bits are set, 1 = if cloud and dilated cloud bits are not set], Bit 7: Water [0 = land or cloud, 1 = water], Bits 8-9: Cloud Confidence [00 = no confidence level set, 01 = low confidence, 10 = medium confidence, 11 = high confidence], Bits 10-11: Cloud Shadow Confidence [00 = no confidence level set, 01 = low confidence, 10 = reserved, 11 = high confidence], Bits 12-13: Snow/Ice Confidence [00 = no confidence level set, 01 = low confidence, 10 = reserved, 11 = high confidence], Bits 14-15: Unused [These bits are not used for flagging]. For Landsat 8-9: bit 0: Fill [0 = image data, 1 = fill data]. bit 1: Dilated Cloud [0 = cloud is not dilated or no cloud, 1 = cloud dilation]. bit 2: Cirrus [0 = no confidence level or low confidence, 1 = high confidence cirrus]. bit 3: Cloud [0 = cloud confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence cloud]. bit 4: Cloud Shadow [0 = cloud shadow confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence cloud shadow]. bit 5: Snow [0 = snow/ice confidence is not high, 1 = high confidence snow cover]. bit 6: Clear [0 = cloud or dilated cloud bits are set, 1 = cloud and dilated Cloud bits are not set]. bit 7: Water [0 = land or cloud, 1 = water]. bits 8-9: Cloud Confidence [00 = for no confidence level set, 01 = low confidence, 10 = medium confidence, 11 = high confidence]. bits 10-11: Cloud Shadow Confidence [00 = no confidence level, 01 = low confidence, 10 = reserved, 11 = high confidence]. bits 12-13: Snow/Ice Confidence [00 = no confidence level, 01 = low confidence, 10 = reserved, 11 = high confidence]. bits 14-15: Cirrus Confidence [00 = no confidence level, 01 = low confidence, 10 = reserved, 11 = high confidence].

values.label: clear_land_etm
values.description: Clear (land) with lows set on clouds (Landsat 4-7)

values.label: clear_water_etm
values.description: Clear (water) with lows set on clouds (Landsat 4-7)

values.label: clear_land_oli
values.description: Clear (land) with lows set on clouds (Landsat 8-9)

values.label: clear_water_oli
values.description: Clear (water) with lows set on clouds (Landsat 8-9)

dem.name: elevation
dem.description: Generated from the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) data in year 2000. Interferometric SAR data from SRTM were reprocessed with an optimized hybrid processing technique in producing the data products.

dsm.name: data
dsm.description: Digital Surface Model (DSM) which represents the surface of the Earth including buildings, infrastructure and vegetation. Based on the radar satellite data acquired during the TanDEM-X Mission 2011-2015.

scl.name: SCL
scl.description: SCL categories (as provided by Sen2Cor processor)

impact_lc.name: data
impact_lc.description: Impact Observatory, Microsoft, and Esri landcover product

m_burn_date.name: Burn_Date
m_burn_date.description: Ordinal day of burn (1-366) for each 500-m grid cell, with 0 = unburned land, -1 = unmapped due to insufficient data, and -2 = water.

m_burn_uncertainty.name: Burn_Date_Uncertainty
m_burn_uncertainty.description: Estimated uncertainty in date of burn, in days. Unburned and unmapped grid cells will always have a value of 0 in this layer.

m_burn_qa.name: QA
m_burn_qa.description: 8-bit quality assurance bit field. bit 0: 0 = water grid cell, 1 = land grid cell. bit 1: Valid data flag (0 = false, 1 = true). A value of 1 indicates that there was sufficient valid data in the reflectance time series for the grid cell to be processed. bit 2: Shortened mapping period (0 = false, 1  = true). This flag indicates that the period of reliable mapping does not encompass the full one-month product period. bit 3: Grid cell was relabeled during the contextual relabeling phase of the algorithm (0 = false, 1 = true). bit 4: Spare bit set to 0. bits 5–7: Special condition code reserved for unburned grid cells.

values.label: na
values.description: Not processed (obsolete; not used since Collection 1)

w_burn_qa.name: QA
w_burn_qa.description: Pixel quality indicators. Bits 0-1: land/water state (00 = water, 01 = coast, 10 = land, 11 = missing data). Bit 2: day/night observation (0 = night, 1 = day).

change.name: change
change.description: Change in water occurrence between the two periods (1984-1999) and (2000-2020).

extent.name: extent
extent.description: Binary indicator of whether water was ever present (from 1984-2020).

occurrence.name: occurrence
occurrence.description: Frequency with which water was present from March 1984 to December 2020.

transitions.name: transitions
transitions.description: Categorical change in surface water status from 1984 to 2020.
